reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the app's practice of collecting user data.
reply.reference: When you use our services (including websites, mobile applications and games), we may collect and use your related information. URL: http://www.domobile.com/privacy.html

If the related information was not provided, otherwise you may not register as our user to use some of our services or we may not able to operate effectively and provide you with the best experiences from our services. reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects device information such as brand, model, operating system, system version, Bluetooth settings, internet connection, RAM, installed applications, running applications, advertising ID, activation time, and country code. It also collects information about the user's use of the services including displayed content, advertisements, visited URLs, notifications, and may potentially access photos, media, files, camera, microphone, Wi-Fi information, device ID, and location data.

content: User's service usage info (content displayed, advertisements, URLs visited, etc.)
User account and game progress information

reply.analysis: The answer is derived from the section that describes the automatic collection of user information when using the services, covering device details, usage information, and account details. It also includes the information collected from third-party tools. The data types collected are detailed within this context.
reply.reference: The app collects information such as device brand, model, operating system, RAM, etc., and user service usage info including content displayed, URLs visited, etc. It also gathers user account and game progress info, and data from third-party tools like account and avatar. URL: http://www.domobile.com/privacy.html

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states the purposes for collecting and using data, such as providing services, assuring product safety, developing new services, analyzing data, improving services, verifying software, administering upgrades, and more.
reply.reference: The privacy policy mentions the purposes of data collection and use, including providing services, assuring product safety, developing new services, analyzing data, improving services, verifying software, administering upgrades, participating in surveys, evaluating advertisements, enabling social features, disclosing information to service providers, and making lawful uses of information. URL: http://www.domobile.com/privacy.html

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the user can request the deletion of the information collected from them by sending an email to privacy@domobile.com.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly states that users have the right to request the deletion of their collected information by contacting a specified email address.
reply.reference: You have the right to request that we delete the information. We will respond to all requests within a reasonable timeframe. URL: http://www.domobile.com/privacy.html

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares data with third parties as mentioned in the privacy policy.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that the app may transfer information to related third-party data analyze service providers and save it. Furthermore, it mentions sharing information with employees, contractors, affiliates, and service providers who provide certain services on behalf of the app.
reply.reference: The information may be transferred to related third-party data analyze service provider and saved by them. We disclose your information to our employees, contractors, affiliates, ('Service Providers') who provide certain services to us or on our behalf. URL: http://www.domobile.com/privacy.html
